c871077a-84ac-48e0-9d07-5a9703852070.description: DifferenceMaker is a campus-wide program that engages UMass Lowell students in creative problem solving, innovation and entrepreneurship. Earners of this badge were part of a student team that developed real solutions to real problems. They were guided to submit an idea for a needed service, product or business that addresses a real world challenge.
c871077a-84ac-48e0-9d07-5a9703852070.name: Rist DifferenceMaker $50K Idea Challenge

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Developed an application for the $50K Idea Challenge

d8eb9aa7-d560-4c3f-ab61-5887d36e6caf.description: Earners of this badge will understand what feedback is and why being able to give feedback is critical to being an influential leader, discover ways to give actionable feedback that drives results and improves performance, and learn how to use feedback to engage and motivate people through increased alignment, improved understanding, and enhanced communication.
d8eb9aa7-d560-4c3f-ab61-5887d36e6caf.name: Leadership Academy: Giving and Receiving Feedback as a Leader

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (1) 3-hour workshop to assess your ability to give and receive feedback and ways you can improve.

57b77645-4cb0-439a-ba53-42e1fe38dff2.description: Earners of this badge will be able to recognize when they are feeling emotional at work so they can manage their own reaction, learn to strategize their encounters instead of reacting without a plan, and learn to lead using these strategies so that others learn from and with them.
57b77645-4cb0-439a-ba53-42e1fe38dff2.name: Leadership Academy: Leading with Emotional Intelligence

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (1) 3-hour workshop to practice skills to better understand emotional intelligence and gauge where you are in becoming more emotionally intelligent.

ff97e2db-797a-424e-b25b-47b07a260df8.description: Earners of this badge share a vested interest in learning more about the plastic waste circular economy and how to combat the effects of plastic waste. They have joined fellow industry professionals and colleagues in academia to hear more about the challenges of conventional plastic recycling; emerging advanced recycling methods; and case studies of using advanced recycling to reuse end-of-life waste. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
ff97e2db-797a-424e-b25b-47b07a260df8.name: Plastic Waste Valorization for a Circular Economy: Advanced Recycling 101

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1-hour webinar on advanced recycling methods

8fca90ee-0ac4-4eb4-b7d9-5aa4b86dad14.description: Earners of this badge will have a clear understanding of how a group becomes a unified, high-performing team, increase buy-in from team members and stakeholders by leveraging the connection between trust, conflict, and accountability, and understand how to drive accountability between team members and stakeholders.
8fca90ee-0ac4-4eb4-b7d9-5aa4b86dad14.name: Leadership Academy: Breaking Barriers, Building Teams

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (1) 3-hour workshop to practice skills to better identify and understand barriers that exist for your team to work more effectively and efficiently and how to manage those barriers to find success.

5fc20d07-44e6-4ebe-8e88-efbcc0245477.description: Earners of this badge will be able to define and strengthen their personal leadership style, understand the power of diversity in building high performing teams, learning power dynamics and how they impact conflict management, and be prepared to align leadership strategies for the future of work.

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (6) 3-hour workshops to practice skills and build your leadership capacity.

1d381f9a-d287-4a57-a37e-da8aac98b025.description: Earners of this badge attended a webinar on the economic and environmental cost of injection molding compared with fused filament fabrication and a hybrid 3D printing/molding process called injection printing. Attendees gained insight into competitive strategy as it relates to injection molding vs. injection printing. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
1d381f9a-d287-4a57-a37e-da8aac98b025.name: Cost and Sustainability Comparison of Injection Molding with 3D Printing

2d6cda9b-ff6c-49b7-ba44-a5093e7da801.description: Earners of the Project Management: Planning & Scheduling certification have an understanding of the core Project Management tenets of scope, time and cost. They know how to tackle an assigned project: where to start, how to define the work, how to make estimates, and how to lead a team in developing a schedule.

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 14-hour seminar in Project Management: Planning & Scheduling, consisting of Live Online facilitator-led synchronous learning and asynchronous, self-paced learning.

73139500-7e2e-4261-a5d3-394bdef71b26.description: Earners attended a hands-on, lab-based seminar that provided comprehensive information about the injection molding process, covered the underlying engineering principles & their application in the molding environment. Lectures covered the basics of the injection molding process and provided practical analyses that yield results & can be applied in the molding shop. Injection molding labs supported the class material to provide experience with actual machine operation & molding techniques.
73139500-7e2e-4261-a5d3-394bdef71b26.name: Injection Molding

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a 5-day seminar on Injection Molding.

da06ac2b-f184-4716-a287-afa61bda7c98.description: Earners of this badge have actively engaged in strengthening their listening, presenting, and writing skills. Earners understand the "value of the voice" (emphasis, tone, pitch, volume) and non-verbal cues in being able to communicate effectively with project team members and stakeholders.
da06ac2b-f184-4716-a287-afa61bda7c98.name: Project Management: Communication Skills

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete seminar consisting of 6 hours of Live Online facilitator-led synchronous learning.

e478e0b4-56b6-4338-a8e3-46464e7ea1dd.description: Earners of this badge are familiar with assigning risk categories, calculating risk probabilities and impact, and using a risk breakdown structure to better manage project risk. Earners have practiced using tools like fishbone diagrams, cause and effect diagrams, and decision tree analysis to expose and manage risk.
e478e0b4-56b6-4338-a8e3-46464e7ea1dd.name: Project Management: Risk Management

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 14-hour seminar in Project Management: Planning & Scheduling, consisting of 8 hours of Live Online facilitator-led synchronous learning and 6 hours of asynchronous learning.

3d33b157-cf5a-4782-a13a-1bb9574448a3.description: Earners of this badge will be able to recognize the opportunities and challenges a diverse work place presents, understand their leadership tendencies, and explore opportunities to develop their leadership capabilities.
3d33b157-cf5a-4782-a13a-1bb9574448a3.name: Leadership Academy: Building Personal Competencies for Inclusive Leadership

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (1) 3-hour workshop to practice skills in becoming a more inclusive leader.

784fa0d2-03c7-4ee0-92c7-4f5aa29d4682.description: Earners of this badge are aware of the need to identify all stakeholders and to collaborate closely with them to ensure project success. Badge earners have gone through the process of stakeholder identification and multiple techniques for stakeholder analysis, followed by the creation of a practical stakeholder management plan.
784fa0d2-03c7-4ee0-92c7-4f5aa29d4682.name: Project Management: Stakeholder Engagement

badge_template_activities.title: Complete seminar consisting of 6 hours of Live Online facilitator-led synchronous learning.

a36519b3-cacf-48d4-9ee9-731ab911295f.description: Earners of this badge will be able to recognize the importance, relevance, and value of workforce ecosystems and the types of workers that they encompass, understand how workforce ecosystems are created and managed, and develop new leadership skills aligned with management practices associated with workforce ecosystems.
a36519b3-cacf-48d4-9ee9-731ab911295f.name: Leadership Academy: Leading the Workforce Ecosystems of the Future

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (1) 3-hour workshop to better understand how the workplace of tomorrow may be different then the workplace of today and how you can analyze the work landscape now to prepare and find success in the future.

4cece470-494e-461b-9d41-a9c87cb1c430.description: Earners of this badge have studied the Agile Manifesto and how the activities in the manifesto are used to support the process. Earners understand the core tenets of the Agile Methodology, with a focus on the Scrum process. Earners have been exposed to concepts like user stories, sprints, backlog, iteration, and retrospective.
4cece470-494e-461b-9d41-a9c87cb1c430.name: Project Management: Agile & Scrum

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete seminar consisting of 7 hours of Live Online facilitator-led synchronous learning.

2a66e3d0-fb81-4bef-80a7-3f26f108217a.description: Earners of this badge will be able to identify sources of power and strategies to build it when you they need a boost to achieve goals, recognize and respond to organizational politics, and negotiate their way to more productive and collaborative outcomes in times of conflict.
2a66e3d0-fb81-4bef-80a7-3f26f108217a.name: Leadership Academy: Leveraging Power, Politics and Negotiations to Accelerate Performance

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (1) 3-hour workshop to practice skills in identifying ways you can use workplace politics, power structures, and negotiations to find success.

fbe84aa7-0bac-42b2-b941-7caa45442f3c.description: Earners attend a hands-on, lab-based seminar on Plastic Part Design for Injection Molding. This seminar is offered to engineers and designers involved in the design of injection-molded plastic parts. The seminar provides a fundamental overview of the many factors associated with plastic parts that will be produced using the injection molding process. Plastic Part Design for Injection Molding labs supplements class material to provide experience with actual machine operation molding techniques.
fbe84aa7-0bac-42b2-b941-7caa45442f3c.name: Plastic Part Design for Injection Molding

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a 4-day seminar on Plastic Part Design for Injection Molding.

1a40c286-5362-4fdd-a863-7a3c7edb03f6.description: Earners of this badge have completed all six seminars in the Project Management training program: Planning & Scheduling; Risk Management; Agile & Scrum; Communication Skills; Negotiation Skills; and Stakeholder Engagement.
1a40c286-5362-4fdd-a863-7a3c7edb03f6.name: Project Management Professional Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Six live online and asynchronous seminars totaling 53 hours of training

505d2f81-e709-4263-9501-d70066f36886.description: Earners attend a hands-on, lab-based seminar on Robust Process Development and Scientific Molding. It reviews the important aspects of the factors required to develop a robust injection molding process, using the techniques of scientific molding and scientific processing. Design of Experiments (DOE) for injection molding is covered. The hands-on workshop included the development of a process using scientific molding principles and a Design of Experiments exercise.
505d2f81-e709-4263-9501-d70066f36886.name: Robust Process Development and Scientific Molding

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a 3-day seminar on Robust Process Development and Scientific Molding.

729148cb-bc3a-40fd-b3cd-ee0634be83e4.description: With a growing emphasis on realizing a circular economy, it’s critical that designers consider recyclability during product development. This talk discussed concepts that plastic part designers can implement to improve the recyclability of pre & post-consumer plastic products. Topics included assembly & decoration methods, product labeling, designing for granular separation, material selection, and more. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
729148cb-bc3a-40fd-b3cd-ee0634be83e4.name: Designing Plastic Products for Enhanced Recyclability

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1-hour webinar on Designing Plastic Products for Enhanced Recyclability

9e30a7bd-00b0-4c2f-80c3-c082ceb30c5f.description: Earners of this badge will be able to discuss and assess on what performance management is and how to utilize to develop team members for the positive while also knowing how/when to have difficult conversations to manage poor performance.
9e30a7bd-00b0-4c2f-80c3-c082ceb30c5f.name: Leadership Academy: Performance Management

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (2) 1.5-hours learning performance management skills as a manager.

e4304864-f5a8-4df8-9ab0-0c3a4e6558b5.description: Earners of this badge attended a webinar that provided a brief overview of definitions and standards used to classify biobased/bio-derived, biodegradable & compostable plastics. Participants were shown a range of bioderived polymers & part-biobased polymers derived from naturally occurring precursors. The possibilities of using waste byproducts as feedstock for the production of biopolymers was discussed. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
e4304864-f5a8-4df8-9ab0-0c3a4e6558b5.name: Biobased Plastics and Sustainability – Aspirations and Reality

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1-hour webinar on Biobased Plastics and Sustainability – Aspirations and Reality

914bac64-d806-4e8c-aeb4-e8ab1d3980f7.description: Earners of this badge attended a webinar clarifying the competitive pros and cons of many commercial polymer families that have targeted the packaging, medical, optical, electronic, and transportation global industries. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
914bac64-d806-4e8c-aeb4-e8ab1d3980f7.name: Competitive Pros and Cons of Transparent Plastics

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1-hour webinar on Competitive Pros and Cons of Transparent Plastics

44025fb5-20bb-4f8a-9820-401f67179f1b.description: Earners of this badge attended a webinar introducing injection molding simulation, its main components, and its use for mold design, analysis, and optimization. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
44025fb5-20bb-4f8a-9820-401f67179f1b.name: Injection Molding Simulation

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1-hour webinar on Injection Molding Simulation

8aed8743-e6af-4664-9d1e-175ddf18cb86.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Negotiating Style Profile (NSP) self-assessment, administered by HRDQ Assessment Center, as a means to understand their unique approach to negotiating. Badge earners practice live role playing as a means to explore various types of negotiating power. Concepts such as the win/win are explored.
8aed8743-e6af-4664-9d1e-175ddf18cb86.name: Project Management: Negotiation Skills

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete seminar consisting of 6 hours of Live Online facilitator-led synchronous learning.

33d7b730-b72d-4f2f-bb34-3e584c0d3539.description: Earners of this badge attended an interactive seminar that examined the sources of conflict and provides techniques for effectively understanding and then handling a disagreement. Disagreements are a natural part of the workplace. Disagreements that are avoided or ignored can become serious problems with long term consequences. In order to resolve a conflict fairly, we must first understand the real issues involved.
33d7b730-b72d-4f2f-bb34-3e584c0d3539.name: Leadership Academy: Conflict Management

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete two 1.5-hour workshops on Conflict management.

af95128a-5d7e-4a43-9501-a8e01d2c6d06.description: Earners of this badge will be able to define and strengthen their personal leadership style, understand the power of diversity in building high performing teams, learning power dynamics and how they impact conflict management, and be prepared to align leadership strategies for the future of work.
af95128a-5d7e-4a43-9501-a8e01d2c6d06.name: Leadership Development Program (Fuhong Therapeutics)

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete two 3-hour workshops and one 6-hour workshop to practice skills and build your leadership capacity.

47b40689-97bf-473d-b17d-316f78d7b669.description: Although most melt compounding is still performed with co-rotating twin screw extruders, there have been improvements for the twin screw extruders and many processors are using other equipment. This webinar discusses the range of equipment available for continuous melt compounding. It also presents comparisons of a twin screw extruder with a quad screw extruder for handling several material systems. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
47b40689-97bf-473d-b17d-316f78d7b669.name: Newer Systems for Melt Compounding Polymer Systems

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1-hour webinar on Newer Systems for Melt Compounding Polymer Systems

36c5c106-9c63-48a7-a021-bcdc1f1a7614.description: Earners of this badge attended a seminar that explored how and why organizational project management supports strategy and provides a sound structure for overseeing the three OPM domains – Project, Program and Portfolio Management. Participants learned how to navigate OPM structures for overseeing complex spectrums, including research and innovation initiatives, product development, revenue, and organizational growth that grows out of undiagnosed challenges.
36c5c106-9c63-48a7-a021-bcdc1f1a7614.name: Project Management: Implementing Organizational Project Management (OPM)

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete three 2-hour seminars in Project Management: Implementing Organizational Project Management (OPM).

548a597d-362e-4ff8-af69-9ee09972fc77.description: Earners of this badge completed a 16-hour (8 two-hour sessions) course that introduced the fundamental principles of Artificial Intelligence (AI) & its business applications. The program provided the participants with an understanding of the current state of AI technologies & the core ideas driving them. The course addressed how AI can be used as part of a business strategy with considerations for building high-performing AI teams. Broader issues such as biases & ethics were also discussed.
548a597d-362e-4ff8-af69-9ee09972fc77.name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 8 two-hour sessions

bc9440c4-451b-4741-93af-1b0fdb97b75a.description: Earners of this badge will have a clear understanding of how a group becomes a unified, high-performing team, increase buy-in from team members and stakeholders by leveraging the connection between trust, conflict, and accountability, and understand how to drive accountability between team members and stakeholders.
bc9440c4-451b-4741-93af-1b0fdb97b75a.name: Leadership Academy: Breaking Barriers, Building Teams (6-hour workshop)

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (1) 6-hour workshop to practice skills to better identify and understand barriers that exist for your team to work more effectively and efficiently and how to manage those barriers to find success.

f75d0ca0-7406-413d-a8a5-2257cdc2ec89.description: Earners of this badge will learn Strategies to help leaders manage performance in the “virtual” or “remote” setting to drive engagement, high performance and how leaders can better understand and develop relationships in better understanding employee motivators and best practices to enhance alignment and communication.
f75d0ca0-7406-413d-a8a5-2257cdc2ec89.name: Leadership Academy: Managing in a Virtual World

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete (2) 1.5-hour class to practice skills in becoming a virtual manager.

0da02fbe-2987-4f76-81c2-2b668a6f458b.description: This badge is tailored towards project managers involved in grant writing, academic research, or non-profit work. Badge earners have foundational knowledge in project planning, scheduling, cost estimation and control, and risk management.
0da02fbe-2987-4f76-81c2-2b668a6f458b.name: Project Management for Researchers

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete seminar consisting of 6 hours of Live Online facilitator-led synchronous learning.

273d7017-4eef-4ccc-a661-0869fd1f6dba.description: Earners of this badge participate in a professional development seminar geared towards working professionals in the Plastics Engineering field. Learning through engaging faculty-led discussion on topics such as materials; the injection molding cycle; molds; molding machines; product design decisions that affect manufacturing; and product defects and troubleshooting. Hands-on lab work includes capillary rheometer and melt flow index; short shot method; mold tear down; and mold change.
273d7017-4eef-4ccc-a661-0869fd1f6dba.name: Injection Molding: A Short Course

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 3-day seminar on Injection Molding

befe34ee-2905-4690-b058-2fa6b54d65e6.description: Earners attended a hands-on, lab-based seminar that provided comprehensive coverage of the extrusion of polymeric materials. Lectures discuss the characteristics of polymeric materials & their effect on the extrusion process. Types of extruders and their components, equipment specifications, instrumentation, and screw geometry are discussed. Specific extrusion processes are discussed & expanded upon if requested by participants. Troubleshooting techniques & operational strategies are covered.
befe34ee-2905-4690-b058-2fa6b54d65e6.name: Extrusion

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a 3-day seminar on Extrusion.

84be61df-6b32-44e4-b6a8-c27cbb0fab38.description: Earners attend a hands-on, lab-based seminar on Polymeric Materials. This workshop provides an overview of the many different families of commercially available polymeric materials. Individual polymers such as commodity plastics, engineering resins, and specialty polymers will be contrasted for end-use functional properties and processability. Polymeric Materials labs supplement class material to provide hands-on experience.
84be61df-6b32-44e4-b6a8-c27cbb0fab38.name: Polymeric Materials

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a 5-day seminar on Polymeric Materials.

ee0d0f54-8b3c-4339-a365-0cf16f21eb24.description: Earners of this badge are exposed to an overview of the many different families of commercially available polymeric materials. Earners also examine the basic concepts of polymerization through structure/property relationships and post-reactor modification, value-added compounding, important thermomechanical properties, design considerations, fundamentals of the various processing schemes, and material selection criteria for commercial end-uses.
ee0d0f54-8b3c-4339-a365-0cf16f21eb24.name: Custom Polymeric Materials for Terumo

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 14 hour training over 2 days

fba8e5d2-8bee-4a8b-903b-fabd206a6199.description: Earners of this badge attended a talk introducing polymer foaming with the aid of physical blowing agent. Various methods of foam injection molding including low-pressure, high-pressure, gas counter pressure and mold opening were also discussed, as well as some of the advantages that foam injection molding process offers over the conventional solid molding. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
fba8e5d2-8bee-4a8b-903b-fabd206a6199.name: Foam Injection Molding

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1-hour webinar on Foam Injection Molding

ea46d672-5eab-445a-8564-cc68c43a8b09.description: Project managers are on the front lines of firm profitability and client satisfaction, yet too many lack the training or support they need. Earners of this badge attended a webinar that provided proven strategies, tools, and techniques to help your project managers become effective leaders, manage projects more profitably, and reach their true “rock star” potential.
ea46d672-5eab-445a-8564-cc68c43a8b09.name: How to Get (and Keep) Rock Star Project Managers

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended an hour long webinar.

d7b5ac57-db1e-4c13-b269-5a29448cad5e.description: Earners of this badge completed a 24-hour (12 two-hour sessions) course introducing the concepts and techniques of machine learning for transforming raw data into business intelligence and insight. The course covers machine learning methodologies and demonstrates examples using an interactive software tool that does not require any programming knowledge. Use of machine learning models and applications from end user perspective were emphasized.
d7b5ac57-db1e-4c13-b269-5a29448cad5e.name: Machine Learning

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 two-hour sessions to practice skills to better identify and understand barriers that exist for your team to work more effectively and efficiently and how to manage those barriers to find success.

7f74c77a-1dd0-40e5-bc87-25a83a5dc241.description: Earners of this badge attended a webinar serving as an introduction to the use of synthetic and natural materials in the medical and health industries. The focus of the webinar was on polymeric materials with some mention of metals, ceramics and composites included. The webinar emphasized the most advanced and well-known successes in biomedical devices. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
7f74c77a-1dd0-40e5-bc87-25a83a5dc241.name: Plastics in Medical Applications

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1-hour webinar on Plastics in Medical Applications.

15ff2caf-2388-4690-856b-7963ddde7526.description: Earners of this badge have completed 3 seminars in the Project Management training program: Planning and Scheduling, Risk Management, and Agile and Scrum.
15ff2caf-2388-4690-856b-7963ddde7526.name: PM Process Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: 3 live online seminars totaling 35 hours of training

437ed798-057d-49f9-be68-7444691a986c.description: Earners of this badge have completed 3 seminars in the Project Leadership training program: Communication Skills; Negotiation Skills; and Stakeholder Engagement.
437ed798-057d-49f9-be68-7444691a986c.name: Project Leadership

4f2c799a-589c-4314-99ab-d3ed5f063d4f.description: Earners of this badge attended a 9 hour onsite program to familiarize engineers with data and common techniques for working with data through the use of Excel; take-home work and assessments may have be given at the company’s discretion.
4f2c799a-589c-4314-99ab-d3ed5f063d4f.name: Statistical Analysis for Engineers

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 9 hour onsite program to familiarize engineers with data and common techniques for working with data through the use of Excel.

17edc1b6-bd64-4b0a-91b0-ea3f00423050.description: A processing-structure-properties investigation of fibers and its significance to modern advanced materials were discussed. This webinar covered traditional and emerging fiber spinning methods, post-processing techniques, and the resulting end-product and utility. The unique physical and chemical properties of fibers and its application as past and emerging advanced materials were discussed. Offered by UMass Lowell in technical partnership with Plastindia International University.
17edc1b6-bd64-4b0a-91b0-ea3f00423050.name: Synthetic Fibers and Textiles

d3cded64-42ff-4511-a451-679050567967.description: Earners attend a hands-on, lab-based seminar on Injection Mold Design. This seminar gives those involved in the thermoplastics injection molding industry a strong fundamental understanding of tooling technology and the underlying engineering principles in the areas of melt flow, cooling, part ejection, and mold structure. Injection Mold Design labs provided participants with an opportunity to study the injection molding process using instrumented tooling.
d3cded64-42ff-4511-a451-679050567967.name: Injection Mold Design

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attended a 3-day seminar on Injection Mold Design.

02513d42-c81a-40fc-a3e7-6269fc5d2e31.description: Earners of this badge attended a course consisting of three days of classroom work centering around the fundamentals of extrusion, various common polymer technology and testing, equipment attributes, and processing. Various structures, raw materials, coextrusion, and other proven processing techniques are covered in depth. Emphasis is placed on providing process setup and troubleshooting. Coursework includes a description of and potential uses and limitations of extrusion coating and laminating.
02513d42-c81a-40fc-a3e7-6269fc5d2e31.name: Applied Extrusion Coating for Industry: Processing and Troubleshooting

issuer.summary: issued by UMass Lowell Corporate Education

adba5468-584e-4187-8cd4-6e09c08a0452.description: Earners of this badge attended a ninety minute seminar introducing the core mentoring skills to be successful as a mentor. The skills introduced include building trusting relationships, providing useful advice, supporting career and personal goals and encouraging learning and discovery.
